message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000 to meet you halfway.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,200, but that's as high as I can go. I really think that's a fair price for the product.
